data.name: Multiple Failed Login Attempts
data.description: Detects multiple failed login attempts from the same user or IP
data.dsl: event_type:login AND result:failure | stats count() by user, src_ip where count > 5

data.name: Potential Data Exfiltration
data.description: Detects large outbound data transfers to external IPs
data.dsl: bytes_out > 1000000000 AND NOT dst_ip:10.0.0.0/8 AND NOT dst_ip:172.16.0.0/12

data.name: Windows Privilege Escalation
data.description: Detects potential privilege escalation attempts on Windows systems
data.sigma_yaml:
title: Windows Privilege Escalation
id: 67f7e67e-fa35-4630-9b3a-84a7dcc0d0b7
status: experimental
description: Detects privilege escalation
logsource:
  product: windows
  service: security
detection:
  selection:
    EventID:
      - 4672
      - 4673
      - 4674
  condition: selection
